StrikeDragons.name: Night Fury
StrikeDragons.description: The Night Fury has cat-like eyes, ear-like appendages, nubs and tendrils protruding from its head, fins behind the hind legs, and tail fins.
StrikeDragons.color: It is jet black with slightly lighter spots.
StrikeDragons.size: Medium: 28 feet 8 inches (8.74 meters) long, 5 feet 9 inches (1.75 meters) tall.

StrikeDragons.name: Deathgrippers
StrikeDragons.description: Deathgrippers have protruding retractable tusks, plate armour along the back, a venomous stinger sheathed at the tip of a telescopic tail, and jagged pincers.
StrikeDragons.color: They can be red and black, yellow and black, purple and black, blue and purple, blue, or green.

StrikeDragons.name: Woolly Howl
StrikeDragons.description: The Woolly Howl has fur-like scales, tail fins, a purple mouth and eyes, and a segmented underbelly.
StrikeDragons.color: It is dark brown with a pale belly.
